data.title: Chateauguay Valley Regional High School Graduation Awards 2021
data.meta_description: Prizes for Achievement in Subject Areas The Miss M. J. Roy Memorial Prizes for outstanding achievement in English – Emilie Exler • Caitlin Frost The Miss M. J. Roy Prizes for outstanding dedication in English – Shayne Meadows • William Orr The Miss M. J. Roy Prizes for sustained effort in English – Riley Aitkens
